dict.string: Remember that the scene is square, and it stretches from `Point(x: -500, y: -500)` on the bottom left to `Point(x: 500, y: 500)` on the top right.
Sketch the universe on a sheet of paper and mark the origin (0, 0). Then mark where you think the center of the galaxy is, and work out roughly what its coordinates are.
The galaxy is in the top right quarter of the scene, so its coordinates will be something like (x, y).
